channel.title: Why won't my solid colored mat color solid?
channel.description:
Alright, I am extremely bored today and decided to try and experiment with models for my first time ever. I am completely dumbfounded with this, so I guess flame me if you want haha.
I created a new mat which is solid black. I am trying to make the Dragon Scimitar handle completely black, but when I select the mat tool and have my black mat selected, it colors gray instead of black.
Picture:
[img]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o129/daggerheart8/dfsdf.jpg[/img]
Thanks for any help. I am going to look for some guides while I wait for a reply.

item.title: Why won't my solid colored mat color solid?

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Alright, I got it. Thanks guys.
